title: Loom Sweater: The Comfort Edit
description: This project was designed to evoke a sense of warmth and style through textured knitwear. We used a rich, layered green background and 3D flowing elements to represent the "Warm & Stylish" nature of the fabric, ensuring the brand stands out in the competitive winter fashion market.

title: Parle: The HD Definite Collection
description: We developed a sophisticated visual identity for the Parle formal line. The project centers on the "HD Definite HD Design" philosophy, using a clean, professional slate-gray environment to emphasize the sharp tailoring and premium fabric of their signature blue formal shirts.

title: Loom Apparel: The Summer Series
description: A high-energy branding project for Loom Apparel featuring a bold, multi-colored "Trendy Shirt." This campaign focused on creating a youthful, "Fashion-forward" aesthetic using vibrant yellow backdrops.

title: Cosmic Nova: The TWS Experience
description: For the launch of the Cosmic Nova earphones, we created a "Crystal Clear" visual concept. The project highlights the Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) technology using soft, fluid color gradients and a minimalist layout to showcase the sleek, futuristic design of the earbuds.

title: Taqwa Home Delivery Brand Identity
description: A comprehensive branding solution for a Saidpur-based delivery service. We focused on reliability and speed by utilizing a high-contrast red and yellow color palette, paired with modern 3D scooter illustrations to clearly communicate their wide range of services from groceries to baby care.

title: Endure Bags: Carry Style with Purpose
description: A minimalist product photography and branding project for Endure Bags. By using a monochromatic sand-toned palette and architectural pedestals, we highlighted the "Comfort & Fashion" aspect of the tote bags, positioning the brand as a leader in refined, everyday luxury.

title: Cosmic Nova: The Bass Project
description: Designed to capture the feeling of high-fidelity sound, this project uses bold typography and rhythmic "sound wave" background elements. The "Feel the Bass" campaign focuses on the structural power of the hardware while maintaining a clean, modern shelf-display aesthetic.
